comment:
*

Acts as a holder for a transformation Source tree in the * form of a Document Object Model (DOM) tree.

* *

Note that XSLT requires namespace support. Attempting to transform a DOM * that was not contructed with a namespace-aware parser may result in errors. * Parsers can be made namespace aware by calling * {@link javax.xml.parsers.DocumentBuilderFactory#setNamespaceAware(boolean awareness)}.

* * @author Jeff Suttor * @version $Revision: 446598 $, $Date: 2006-09-15 05:55:40 -0700 (Fri, 15 Sep 2006) $ * @see Document Object Model (DOM) Level 2 Specification

variables.name: systemID
variables.comment:
*

The base ID (URL or system ID) from where URLs * will be resolved.

variables.name: FEATURE

methods.name: public void setNode(Node node)
methods.comment:
* Set the node that will represents a Source DOM tree.
     *
     * @param node The node that is to be transformed.

methods.name: public Node getNode()
methods.comment:
* Get the node that represents a Source DOM tree.
     *
     * @return The node that is to be transformed.

methods.name: public void setSystemId(String systemID)
methods.comment:
* Set the base ID (URL or system ID) from where URLs
     * will be resolved.
     *
     * @param systemID Base URL for this DOM tree.

methods.name: public String getSystemId()
methods.comment:
* Get the base ID (URL or system ID) from where URLs
     * will be resolved.
     *
     * @return Base URL for this DOM tree.
